column2: Toast, Time: 5, Portions: 1, Calories: 400, Ingredients: Toast, Cheese, Ham, Procedure: Assemble the toast and grill if desired.
column3: Chicken Caesar Salad, Time: 12, Portions: 1, Calories: 350, Ingredients: Chicken: 120g, Lettuce, Croutons, Caesar dressing: 1 tbsp, Procedure: Cook chicken, add lettuce, croutons and dressing, then toss.
column4: One-Pot Chicken Pasta, Time: 20, Portions: 1, Calories: 480, Ingredients: Pasta: 100g, Chicken: 120g, Cherry tomatoes: 100g, Spinach: 50g, Procedure: Cook chicken, add pasta, tomatoes and water. Simmer until pasta is done, stir in cream cheese and spinach.
